channel.title: New Easy Way To Portforawrd
channel.description:
[center][b][size=12pt]This is a repost because i posted it in server downloads before it had plenty of good comments. so i dont need you're flame[/size][/b] [b]Ok idk If this is the right section to put this but w.e i found this program a while ago and it works really good for me i think the easiest way to portforward. the program is called [u]Simple Portforwarding[/u]. [s]I don't really know what all to say about it so i guess ill show you some screen shots.[/s] well nvm for some reason i cant get a screenshot of it every program i try it some how doesnt get the program lol w.e its a VERY simple program easier then pfing on utorrent just try it you'll see ill even get a virus scan so u know its not one and if u still think it is don't download it... just let me know what you think if you do download it. oh yeah and it accually port forwards your router unlike utorrent so yeah. lmk ill keep trying to get the pic's. and if this is the wrong section mod please move to the right.[/b] [/center] [quote="razami, post:14, topic:355698"]DAMN this shit is amazing thanks dude ^_^ this is easier then those dumb tuts from those smart asses who think there better then everyone. P.S. Can this do 2 ports? for like highscores lol[/quote] here is the download i nvr reuploaded it [url=http://adf.ly/5Nwu]http://adf.ly/5Nwu[/url] (yes i made it adf.ly because the origonal download was huge lol don't matter not doing this for the money..) [center]

item.title: New Easy Way To Portforawrd
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

nicks:

i don’t think i will i used to use r-s and people there do not flame as much, and by far are way better coders.

That’s a laugh in a half, they are not better programmers most of the members of r-s are member of moparscape so I don’t see were you’re logic is coming from. You will also get flamed more for this, if you can’t port forward what makes you think you can program well.

Read full topic

mk then where would you like me to post this?

Don’t post it anywhere.

item.title: New Easy Way To Portforawrd
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

well other people post stuff that isnt theres all the time and yes im pretty sure this forum needs this and if you don’t want it ill take it down for sure but everyone that has downloaded it has liked it alot. you can port forward in about 10sec’s and it accually adds the open ports to your router not like shitty utorrent. trust me its the best way to do it the automatic portforwarder u guys already have takes forever and you accually have to do stuff other then click a few times.

Read full topic

item.title: New Easy Way To Portforawrd
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I suggest you ask a moderator, I can’t think of any section that allows you to post something that doesn’t belong to you. Why do you want to post it anyway? There are already multiple threads about port forwarding, as well as other websites that tell you how to port forward. I don’t think we need this.

Read full topic

item.title: New Easy Way To Portforawrd
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well that was rather uncalled for, why don’t you read the rules?
This doesn’t meet the requirements of a tutorial, and as for your topic in the download section

1) [b]All content posted must be yours and yours ONLY![/b] If broken, a punishment will be given depending on the material posted and the situation at hand. People helping out here and there is, of course, allowed, as long as the majority of the project belongs to you. There is an exception though: if it was a team project it is okay for all members to own credit and to be posted only if credit is given where credit is due.

Read full topic

@nicks wrote:

[center][size=12pt]This is a repost because i posted it in server downloads before it had plenty of good comments. so i dont need you’re flame[/size]

[b]Ok idk If this is the right section to put this but w.e i found this program a while ago and it works really good for me i think the easiest way to portforward. the program is called Simple Portforwarding.

I don’t really know what all to say about it so i guess ill show you some screen shots.
well nvm for some reason i cant get a screenshot of it every program i try it some how doesnt get the program lol w.e
its a VERY simple program easier then pfing on utorrent just try it you’ll see ill even get a virus scan so u know its not one and if u still think it is don’t download it…
just let me know what you think if you do download it.
oh yeah and it accually port forwards your router unlike utorrent so yeah.

lmk

ill keep trying to get the pic’s.

and if this is the wrong section mod please move to the right.[/b]

P.S. Can this do 2 ports? for like highscores lol[/quote]
